job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: Detailed Job descriptionbrbr brbrTitle Software EngineerbrbrLocation Santa Clara CA 95051 RemotebrbrDuration 6 Months Possible Extensionbrbr brbrJob DescriptionbrbrJoin us in this innovative solutionsoriented environment and youll take leadership of the development and design of product process and technological advancements Youll have lots of opportunity to research new technology transform concepts and strategies into structured projects and make key technical decisionsbrbr brbrDesign products and specifies the components that make up the products Designs and develops products components processes and systems using broad engineering concepts and research techniques Document research and design specifications Solves complex and high impact design and development problems including customer application issue of varying scope and complexity Uses product and customer applications knowledge to determine define develop and validate design concepts and methods May facilitate transition of product design and enhancements to full productiondelivery May lead product definitionsystem design for complex features or coordinate a small group in feature development and integrationbrbr brbrKey ResponsibilitiesbrbrClient is developing a range of innovative enterprise and cloudbased software products for the design analysis and interpretation of genetic data As a future Senior Software Engineer in our team we expect you tobrbrMaintain strengthen and improve our Enterprise and Core SaaS Platforms for genomics design and data analysisbrbrLead and drive the technical design and development of new Components Services  ApplicationsbrbrTake ownership in getting code to production and a handson approach in troubleshooting when necessarybrbrResearch recommend develop and implement improvements across the software stack in a proactive mannerbrbrMaintain and share expertise in multiple technologies that are used in our software productsbrbrReduce broad concepts business strategies into structured projectsbrbrLead the designdelivery of new productprocessservice technology advancements is the key technical contributorbrbrSolve complex high impact designdevelopment problemsbrbr brbrRequirementsbrbrBachelor or Master degree in Computer Science Software Engineering or similar through experiencebrbrAt least 8 years of relevant experience preferentially working with Enterprise or Software as a Service productsbrbrYoure a selfstarter capable of working autonomously and proactively You have a problemsolving attitude have experience with writing technical documentation and are able to clearly communicate in EnglishbrbrYou write highquality code and always take scalability robustness and reusability into account when designing software componentsbrbrA solid understanding of ObjectOriented Design and the ability to select the right tool for the jobbrbrSince we use JavaScript AngularJS Java and Python extensively throughout our applications a proven track record with any of them is considered a big plusbrbrAn eye for a cohesive user interface understanding of design principles usability and experience with the visualization of complex data   brbrA knack for decomposition and knowledge of the principles behind serviceoriented architecture andor microservices using REST APIs or RPC frameworksbrbrExperience with relational databases such as Oracle PostgreSQL knowledge of the benefits for nonrelational databases Elasticsearch etcbrbrAn idea of what the building blocks are of distributed systems such as queues and message brokersbrbrFamiliarity with the core tenets of the public cloud Object Storage and experience with Amazon Web Services Amazon S3 EC2brbrGood understanding of Agile practicesbrbrYou have a positive attitude and look for opportunities to collaborate both within your team but also within the broader organization You appreciate a fun and diverse working environmentbrbr
